name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 413 | Maternal Care Observation
description:
This record documents a moment of maternal care among dogs at MaMeeFarm™.

The image captures young puppies nursing from their mother while being observed on-site.
This activity reflects a routine life-care situation within the farm environment, where animal well-being and natural dependency are continuously present.

Recorded Context:

Activity: Puppies nursing from mother

Species: Dog

Care Type: Maternal care
